typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cd_city as string,
		no_city as string,
		cd_state as string,
		pop as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> cities
source(output(
		no_city as string,
		no_pais as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> countries
Join1 filter(toInteger(pop)>2000001) ~> Filter1
cities, countries join(cities@no_city == countries@no_city,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Filter1 sink(input(
		nu_city as integer,
		no_city as string,
		cd_state as string,
		no_pais as string,
		pop as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		cd_state,
		no_pais,
		pop,
		no_city = cities@no_city,
		nu_city = cd_city
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> dbalexcities
